summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to the EOP - Columbia Center, L.L.C. by Ordinance 111826, as modified by Resolution No. 29779, to construct, maintain, and operate a pedestrian tunnel under and across the 5th Avenue and Columbia Street intersection, by amending Section 12 to eliminate consent by the City Council of financing, loans, or mortgages secured in part by EOP - Columbia Center, L.L.C's rights in said pedestrian tunnel.
